comment: She is very awesome. You can do without a textbook. Online homework is easy to do and allow unlimited attempts. Cheat sheets are optional on every test.

Such a good math teacher. Attendance isn't mandatory but get bonus points at end of semester for good attendance. Allows cheat sheet on every test. Posts all notes to D2L. Exams follow study-guide exactly. Gives extra credit on all quizzes and exams. Awesome professor!

Took her for Elementary Statistics, Math 1107. First time i've ever really understood math. She12 gives you outline of notes, and allows notecard with formulas for test. She takes attendance. Good teacher, easy A or B if you pay attention and try.
